mapper.insert: insert into business_order(id,billing_time,old_order_code,require_time,material_code, req_count,material_size, material,unzero_code, cutting_die_code,color, remark, imp_time, last_time,description,excel_index,orderid,customer) values(#{id},#{billingTime},#{oldOrderCode},#{requireTime},#{materialCode}, #{reqCount},#{materialSize}, #{material},#{unzeroCode}, #{cuttingDieCode},#{color},#{ remark},#{ impTime},#{lastTime},#{description},#{excelIndex},#{orderid},#{customer})
mapper.select: select * from business_order where material_code =#{value} or old_order_code=#{value} order by billing_time desc
mapper.update: update business_order set req_count=#{reqCount} where id = #{id}
